thread.section_title: Pangea Real Estate Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Pangea Real Estate | www.pangeare.com
thread.title: Gabriella Knox
thread.title_full: Pangea Real Estate reviewed by Gabriella Knox

author: Gabriella Knox
title: Gabriella Knox
text: I wasn't too sure what to need/want in a apartment, but the people at Pangea made it really easy for me , & they are very helpful in the search . I had a apartment in mind and I told them how much I was looking to pay and they helped me find the right apartment in a great neighborhood near transportation to get to and from work in a timely fashion . Thanks a lot I'm very happy and will be moving in soon !
